title: GEObridge -- an R package to connect the GEO database and researcher
text: Data Science (DS) becoming important recently everyone already feels . Data analysis infiltrated every industrial academic field including news, sport, biopharma, big tech, precision medicine. Specifically, precision medicine looks genetics, disease environment, diet person order select treatment work best patient, significantly dependent large-scale sequencing data. National Center Biotechnology Information (NCBI) released public repository, named Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO) [2-4], high-throughput molecular abundance experiment data, providing free distribution shared access comprehensive datasets. Till 10/26/2022, GEO contains 216,550 datasets 4,446,632 samples covering Homo sapiens, Mus musculus, organisms. number datasets accumulated GEO, downloading querying data GEO database became difficult problem due large scale category complexity . lot methods tools developed last two decades solve urgent issue satisfy unmet needs different user groups including bioinformaticians, doctors without coding experience, biologists focus cancer immunotherapy development, . GEOquery one popular outstanding R package enable user download sequencing data GEO database access ID references [1]. package available Bioconductor platform well GEOmetadb [5]. GEO data browser [6] official tool GEO database similar internal search engine inside GEO database. However, manual searching thousands datasets millions samples enough heavy labor research topic. Thus, GEO metadb becomes useful tool mining data GEO. GEOmetadb one popular R packages among -mentioned R packages due powerful search function clear data storage structure based Structured Query Language (SQL). However, existing tool enables analysis downloaded table using GEOmetadb R package. Specifically, existing R function search analyze queried table summary category based interested platform organism GEO database. , proposed develop novel R package named GEObridge solve pain points users whose work benefit R package. challenge 1 Many Categories Popped Searching Keyword One advantage GEO database complete information biggest database public domain. hand, also brings issue many categories returned using searching function. let user feel overwhelmed know scale dataset. One solution issue provide filter function parameter. help filter, user can filter non-interested information complex categories. example, searching function can return platforms (e.g. microarray, bulk RNA-seq, etc.) user cares top 5 popular platforms. user can set filter parameter 5 remove less frequency platform returned search result. challenge 2 Long Waiting Time Search Function Another challenge faced package development search process slow. researching little bit issue, turns current SQL-based query method already efficient way extract information large table. Meanwhile, also learned knowledge time complexity memory complexity computer science major since courses mentioned related terminology. reduce time complexity, common way computer science increase memory complexity. Thus, solution issue prepare result frequently used function advance saved package. challenge 3 user-friendly visualization method public available Even two points can solved package, user still want find way visualize result can used publication. also help user get better understanding GEO dataset meta information. , make two functions solve challange. first plot function draw barplot frequent platform summaried download database. user can select number frequent parameter top 5 top 10 platforms. second function draw barplot interactive way. user can select interested platforms draw barplot dynamically thanks power RShiny gadget. user can use mice click select several platforms show right panel instantly. vignette GEObridge R package. vignette, use four examples demostrate utility feasibility proposed R package. proposed GEObridge package use several functions GEOmetadb package query full meta information GEO database. , illustrate important proposed R package showing four examples.

what: GEObridge -- an R package to connect the GEO database and researcher
title: GEObridge -- an R package to connect the GEO database and researcher
text: primary goal GEObridge package build R package depends GEOmetadb package provides user-friendly functions dig information downloaded table. GEOmetadb can help user download whole database local laptop. However, efficiently use download database hard problem. first goal GEObridge provide function let user search target samples, platforms, experiments downloaded SQLite file. demonstrated search function next section Code Example. appendix also provides demo’s full script R environment based sessionInfo() function.

what: GEObridge -- an R package to connect the GEO database and researcher
title: GEObridge -- an R package to connect the GEO database and researcher
text: second goal GEObrige package provide series functions visualize meta information GEO database. GEO database large contains almost every type data (e.g. Microarray, RNA-seq, single RNA-seq (scRNA-seq), Homo sapiens, Mus musculus). extract useful interesting datasets become important issue. SQLite file downloaded local laptop, provide several functions generate plots show statistics data. demonstrated visualization functions next section Code Example.

title: GEObridge -- an R package to connect the GEO database and researcher
text: proposed GEObridge design provide stream functions GEOmetadb package. Firstly, show install GEOmetadb package. , show seven table contains meta information need thereafter. Note, GEOmetadb pacakge publised CRAN. Thus, use install.package() function install package. Instead, need install package Bioconductor, platform open source software bioinformatics.

what: 3.1 Check All Meta Data in Downloaded SQLite File
title: GEObridge -- an R package to connect the GEO database and researcher
text: already know downloaded SQLite file huge due contains meta data GEO stored high efficient tables. print different tables SQLite. total, 11 tables stored file. table contains different meta information. example, table gse contains GES ID datase related meta information.
code: library(GEObridge) #load our own package ## Setting options('download.file.method.GEOquery'='auto') ## Setting options('GEOquery.inmemory.gpl'=FALSE) connection = prepare_table(printAllTable=TRUE, subTable='gse') ## [1] "-----ALl tables stored in the database-----" ##  [1] "gds"               "gds_subset"        "geoConvert"        ##  [4] "geodb_column_desc" "gpl"               "gse"               ##  [7] "gse_gpl"           "gse_gsm"           "gsm"               ## [10] "metaInfo"          "sMatrix"           ## [1] "------Print columns for your inputted sub table-----" ##  [1] "ID"                   "title"                "gse"                  ##  [4] "status"               "submission_date"      "last_update_date"     ##  [7] "pubmed_id"            "summary"              "type"                 ## [10] "contributor"          "web_link"             "overall_design"       ## [13] "repeats"              "repeats_sample_list"  "variable"             ## [16] "variable_description" "contact"              "supplementary_file" connection_tmp = prepare_table(printAllTable=TRUE, subTable='gsm') ## [1] "-----ALl tables stored in the database-----" ##  [1] "gds"               "gds_subset"        "geoConvert"        ##  [4] "geodb_column_desc" "gpl"               "gse"               ##  [7] "gse_gpl"           "gse_gsm"           "gsm"               ## [10] "metaInfo"          "sMatrix"           ## [1] "------Print columns for your inputted sub table-----" ##  [1] "ID"                     "title"                  "gsm"                    ##  [4] "series_id"              "gpl"                    "status"                 ##  [7] "submission_date"        "last_update_date"       "type"                   ## [10] "source_name_ch1"        "organism_ch1"           "characteristics_ch1"    ## [13] "molecule_ch1"           "label_ch1"              "treatment_protocol_ch1" ## [16] "extract_protocol_ch1"   "label_protocol_ch1"     "source_name_ch2"        ## [19] "organism_ch2"           "characteristics_ch2"    "molecule_ch2"           ## [22] "label_ch2"              "treatment_protocol_ch2" "extract_protocol_ch2"   ## [25] "label_protocol_ch2"     "hyb_protocol"           "description"            ## [28] "data_processing"        "contact"                "supplementary_file"     ## [31] "data_row_count"         "channel_count"

what: 4.1 Demo 1: Search Cancer-Specific Datasets with Keyword ‘breast’ in Homo Sapiens
title: GEObridge -- an R package to connect the GEO database and researcher
text: enable searching function GEObridge, need save GSE table current workspace. , just extract top 2,000 datasets save time. user can download dataset using access GSE ID GEO database perform different bioinformatics analysis.
code: search_res = keyword_search(key1='breast', key2='cancer', limitN=2000, verbose=TRUE, db=connection, subTable='gse') ## [1] "Total dataset size:" ## [1] 2000   18 ## [1] "First keyword searched dataset size:" ## [1] 156 ## [1] "Second keyword searched dataset size:" ## [1] 462

what: 4.4 Demo 4: Interactive Barplot with Shiny Gadget
title: GEObridge -- an R package to connect the GEO database and researcher
text: One disadvantage function figure always show top frequent platforms. However, user want plot several interested platforms barplot. Due static document show unpublished interactive Shiny Gadget, demostrate function video. user can also call function RStudio console. input parameter variable generated last step. function barplot_interact() running, RStudio pop Viewer panel right side. Shiny Gadget, user can select several platforms provided input variable. user click box front selected platforms, right barplot update instantly. can help user generate publish qulity figure interested platforms.
code: # Due to the static document cannot show the interactive Shiny Gadget, we will demostrate this function in the video. # However, you can run below code in your RStudio to play with it.  # barplot_interact(top10)

what: 6.1 A more powerful searching function in the next version
title: GEObridge -- an R package to connect the GEO database and researcher
text: One limitation current version package searching function supports two keywords searching database. However, disease might require searching keys Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL) Clear cell renal cell carcinoma (ccRCC). enable powerful searching function high flexibility, proposed next version searching function. input parameter include list variable contains multiple searching keywords. new version function scheduled, development publish later initial version package submitted Comprehensive R Archive Network (CRAN).

title: GEObridge -- an R package to connect the GEO database and researcher
text: Another limitation current version package provide barplot function platform statistics due tight time schedule. Even interactive tool thanks RShiny Gadget, user still want different kinds visualization presentation. , plan establish several plot function including pie plot, boxplot, violin plot, ridgeline plot, correlation plot following version GEObridge package. plot function based ggplot2 package well providing user friendly options considering GEObridge scenario. addition, still use RShiny Gadget function provide high flexibility plot function generate publish quality figure.
